steps.name: Home and living
steps.intro: This section is about your safety at home

fields.question: I am able to clean and maintain my home on my own and without help not causing significant pain, distress or anxiety, or endangering myself or others and not taking significantly longer than would normally be expected.
fields.id: I am able to clean and maintain my home on my own and without help not causing significant pain, distress or anxiety, or endangering myself or others and not taking significantly longer than would normally be expected.

fields.question: I am able to manage my day to day paperwork on my own and without help not causing significant pain, distress or anxiety, or endangering myself or others and not taking significantly longer than would normally be expected.
fields.id: I am able to manage my day to day paperwork on my own and without help not causing significant pain, distress or anxiety, or endangering myself or others and not taking significantly longer than would normally be expected.

fields.question: I am able to use the toilet on my own and without help not causing significant pain, distress or anxiety, or endangering myself or others and not taking significantly longer than would normally be expected.
fields.id: I am able to use the toilet on my own and without help not causing significant pain, distress or anxiety, or endangering myself or others and not taking significantly longer than would normally be expected.

fields.question: I am able to wash on my own and without help not causing significant pain, distress or anxiety, or endangering myself or others and not taking significantly longer than would normally be expected.
fields.id: I am able to wash on my own and without help not causing significant pain, distress or anxiety, or endangering myself or others and not taking significantly longer than would normally be expected.

fields.question: Primary address tenure type

choices.label: Owner occupier or shared ownership scheme
choices.value: Owner occupier or shared ownership scheme

choices.value: Tenant (including local authority, arms length management organisations, registered social landlord, housing association)

choices.value: Settled mainstream housing with family/friends (including flat sharing)

choices.value: Supported accommodation / supported lodgings / supported group home (i.e. accommodation supported by staff or resident care taker)

choices.label: Approved premises for offenders released from prison or under probation supervision (e.g. probation hostel)
choices.value: Approved premises for offenders released from prison or under probation supervision (e.g. probation hostel)

choices.value: Mobile accommodation for Gypsy / Roma and Traveller communities,

fields.hint: e.g. how they see the needs of this person, how they see the situation has changed, how they support this person

fields.hint: including vision and hearing loss, mental and physical health

fields.hint: e.g list, independent, with support, dosette box, blister box, oxygen machine
fields.id: Medication (e.g list, independent, with support, dosette box, blister box)

fields.id: When were you last seen by your GP?

fields.question: Does the person have recourse to public funds?
fields.id: Does the person have recourse to public funds?

fields.question: Do you have a condition as a result of either your physical, mental, sensory, learning or cognitive disabilities or illnesses, substance misuse or brain injury?
fields.id: Do you have a condition as a result of either your physical, mental, sensory, learning or cognitive disabilities or illnesses, substance misuse or brain injury?

fields.question: Can you "Maintain a habitable home environment" alone within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety, or risk to yourself or others?
fields.hint: Are you able to clean your home independently?
fields.id: Can you "Maintain a habitable home environment" alone within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety, or risk to yourself or others?

fields.question: Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: (e.g house work, laundry, disrepair issues, infestation, hoarding)
fields.id: Habitable home environment details screening

fields.question: Can you "Manage and maintain nutrition" alone within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
fields.hint: Are you able to eat and drink independently? Are you able to prepare meals independently?
fields.id: Can you "Manage and maintain nutrition" alone within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?

fields.question: Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: (e.g shopping, food / drink preparation, eating and drinking, diet, swallowing)
fields.id: Details of related needs and goals

fields.question: Can you "Manage toilet needs" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
fields.hint: Are you able to use the toilet independently? Is your toilet of an appropriate height?
fields.id: Can you "Manage toilet needs" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?

fields.question: Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: (e.g wash self after toilet, continence, pressure care)
fields.id: Details of related needs and goals

fields.question: Can you "Be appropriately clothed" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
fields.hint: Are you able to dress and undress independently?
fields.id: Can you "Be appropriately clothed" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?

fields.question: Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: (e.g dressing - for all seasons, activity based tasks, zips, buttons)
fields.id: Details of related needs and goals

fields.question: Can you "Develop and maintain family or other personal relationships" alone within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
fields.hint: Are you in contact with family or friends via phone / email / visits / other ways?
fields.id: Can you "Develop and maintain family or other personal relationships" alone within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?

fields.question: Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: (e.g social, family/other personal relationships, isolation, leisure)
fields.id: Details of related needs and goals

fields.question: Can you "Make use of necessary facilities or services in the local community?"
fields.hint: Are you able to access facilities like the library and other local places?
fields.id: Can you "Make use of necessary facilities or services in the local community?"

fields.question: Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: For example, outdoor mobility, wheelchair use, access, public or hospital transport
fields.id: Details of related needs and goals

fields.question: Can you "Access and engage in work, training, education or volunteering" alone within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
fields.hint: Are you currently working / in education / training /in receipt of pension or receiving benefits?
fields.id: Can you "Access and engage in work, training, education or volunteering" alone within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?

fields.question: Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: Access and engage in work, training, education or volunteering
fields.id: Details of related needs and goals

fields.question: Can you "Carry out any caring responsibilities for a child" alone within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
fields.hint: Do you have any caring responsibilities for children or young people?
fields.id: Can you "Carry out any caring responsibilities for a child" alone within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?

fields.question: Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: Carry out any caring responsibilities for a child
fields.id: Details of related needs and goals

fields.question: Can you "Be able to make use of your home safely" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
fields.hint: Do you feel safe being alone at home? Are you currently at risk of falls? Would telecare be helpful for this resident?
fields.id: Can you "Be able to make use of your home safely" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?

fields.question: Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: For example, transfers - bath/shower, chair, toilet/commode and bed. Mobility - indoor, stairs, and falls.  Access to essential facilities, re-housing etc
fields.id: Details of related needs and goals

fields.question: As a result of your needs are you unable to achieve two or more of the eligible outcomes below?
fields.id: As a result of your needs are you unable to achieve two or more of the eligible outcomes below?

fields.question: As a result of being unable to achieve these outcomes is there, or is there likely to be, a significant impact on your wellbeing?
fields.hint: If inability to achieve these outcomes significantly impacts their wellbeing, they may have support needs.
fields.id: As a result of being unable to achieve these outcomes is there, or is there likely to be, a significant impact on your wellbeing?

fields.question: Details of the impact on your wellbeing (in the absence of any support you may already have in place)
fields.hint: The impact on your wellbeing should be looked at disregarding any support you may already have and should take into account the following areas, as well as your (or your representatives) views.
fields.id: Details of the impact on your wellbeing (in the absence of any support you may already have in place)

fields.question: Additional notes
fields.hint: A space to copy in all of the details or other notes
fields.id: Additional notes
